name: europeana
title: EUROPEANA
description: Europeana.eu ([EUROPEANA](http://europeana.ac.at/ "EUROPEANA")) enables people to explore the digital resources of Europe's galleries, museums, libraries, archives and audiovisual collections. On this blog, you can discover treasures from Europeana's open content archives, as well as information about special events and things we are working on.
